item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Samuel Horovatin and I’m the proud owner of this site! I have made this as a mixture blog/portfolio/resume. I am currently in my second year of a Master’s Degree in Computer Science at the University of Saskatchewan (specializing in bioinformatics). Previously, I completed a Bachelor of Science Honours degree in Computer Science at the University of Saskatchewan in April, 2020. I have experience in bioinfromatics, data science, project management, back-end technology, cloud, and API development.
